example: Jaskr.com: Every day journalists spend hours finding which information people need to know about Public Figures. We offer a publisher network to collect millions of questions and give to the journalist the popular ones with the best question recognition technology
placeholder1: Highlight the enormity of the problem you are tackling
placeholder2: Tell the audience up front what your company sells
placeholder3: Distill the differentiation down to one, easy-to-comprehend sentence
placeholder4: Establish credibility by sharing the pedigree of the entrepreneurs, customers, or the investors
